snippet: A family tragedy has left this novel’s twin narrators unrecognizable to themselves and each other.
abstract: Lauren Oliver reviews book I'll Give You the Sun by Jandy Nelson.
lead_paragraph: A family tragedy has left this novel’s twin narrators unrecognizable to themselves and each other.

headline.main: ‘I’ll Give You the Sun,’ by Jandy Nelson
headline.print_headline: The Other Half of the Story
